definition: Portugal/Portuguese/abbr. for 葡萄牙[Pu2 tao2 ya2]
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: That's for mechanical harvesting-the grape growers'way of beating the unions.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了便于机械收割，是葡萄园主对付工会的办法。

sentences.english: Pictured here: A couple walks through the Lavaux Vineyard Terraces along Lake Geneva in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 图为一对夫妇沿瑞士日内瓦湖在拉沃克斯葡萄园散步。

sentences.english: For most of the year, the population of Martha's Vineyard is about fifteen thousand.
sentences.chinese: 今年的大部分时间，玛莎葡萄园岛的人口大约十五万。

sentences.english: From the eagle's nest, there is vineyard as far as the eye can see.
sentences.chinese: 在那鹰鸟筑巢的地方，你可以看到一望无际的葡萄园。

sentences.english: Syrah grape potential in Haras de Pirque's vineyards is shown in this Syrah Character.
sentences.chinese: 种马园葡萄园设拉子的潜力尽现于此款葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Vineyards of white grapes are covered in snow in the Lavaux region on the shores of the Lake Geneva, in Aran, Switzerland, Thursday, Dec. 2, 2010. AP / Laurent Gillieron
sentences.chinese: 瑞士日内瓦湖岸边覆盖着白雪的葡萄园。

sentences.english: He loved to participate in wine tastings for the vineyard.
sentences.chinese: 他乐衷于参加葡萄园的酒品品尝。

sentences.english: He liked to fly to Tuscany to look after his vineyard.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢飞到托斯卡纳去照看他的葡萄园。

sentences.english: I bought some in a grapery not too far from second sister's home.
sentences.chinese: 在二姐家附近的葡萄园买了些葡萄。

sentences.english: We also have the second largest planting area of 108 hectares in Medoc.
sentences.chinese: 我们拥有美度区第二大面积的108公顷的葡萄园。

sentences.english: Do the same with your vineyard and your olive grove.
sentences.chinese: 你的葡萄园和橄榄园也要照样办理。

sentences.english: "Dead Arm" is vine disease which affects vineyard across the world.
sentences.chinese: “枯藤”是一种影响全世界葡萄园的树枝疾病。

sentences.english: Thegravely soil is capable of draining water as well as a steep hillside.
sentences.chinese: “爱恨味”葡萄园处陡坡之上，土壤排水能力非常强。

sentences.english: Shimei the Ramathite was in charge of the vineyards.
sentences.chinese: 掌管葡萄园的是拉玛人示每。

sentences.english: Train Trak is a family owned vineyard.
sentences.chinese: 彻雷切克是座一家族葡萄园。

sentences.english: The next day we left for Martha’s Vineyard on our annual vacation.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，我们去玛莎葡萄园岛，开始每年一次的休假。

definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), kingdom during medieval period, now region of France
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
